description: The Royal Canadian Mounted Police Air Services Branch requires Propeller Repair & Overhaul Services
full_summary:
# Tender Announcement: Propeller Repair & Overhaul Services

## Solicitation Number
202302840

## Tender Title
Propeller Repair & Overhaul Services

## Issuing Agency
Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) Air Services Branch

## Closing Date and Time
July 23, 2024, 14:00:00 (local time)

## Contract Period
Three (3) years, with an option to extend for up to four (4) additional one-year periods.

## Notice Type
Request for Proposal (RFP)

## Method of Tendering
Competitive – Open Bidding

## Selection Criteria
The lowest price will be used as the primary factor in selecting the successful bidder.

## Trade Agreements
Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Goods and Services Code
78181800 – Fixed wing aircraft maintenance and repair services

## Regions of Opportunity
Worldwide

## Regions of Delivery
Canada

## End Date
August 12, 2027

## Attachments
Tender documents can be downloaded from the Canada Business Network at [link](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/41254/rfp-202302840---propeller-repair-overhaul-services.pdf)

## Note
This tender announcement constitutes a notice pursuant to Section 28 of the Trade Agreements Act.

## Contact Information
Trevor Clark
Procurment Officer, RCMP
Phone: (343) 575-4993
Email: [trevor.clark@rcmp-grc.gc.ca](mailto:trevor.clark@rcmp-grc.gc.ca)

## Important Information
*   A non-refundable cash deposit of $25 shall be submitted with each bid.
*   Canada will not assume any responsibility for the information provided on websites of third parties.
*   Suppliers who meet the conditions of eligibility and are well-established in Canada are encouraged to bid.

## Related Information
For more information on Indigenous Procurement initiatives, please visit the Canada.ca website at [https://canada.ca/indigenousbusinessdirectory](https://canada.ca/indigenousbusinessdirectory). 

Please respond to this tender announcement by submitting your proposal through [link](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities).

The documents can be downloaded in both official languages of Canada. The RCMP reserves the right to negotiate with any supplier.

Please note that Canada is not responsible and will not assume any liability for the information
